phys::ColourValue Class Reference

This is a simple class for holding 4 reals representing the colour any give object or lightsource can have. More...

#include <colourvalue.h>

Public Attributes

Real Red
 Value from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the amount of red present in the colour.
Real Green
 Value from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the amount of green present in the colour.
Real Blue
 Value from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the amount of blue present in the colour.
Real Alpha
 Value from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the transparency of the colours.

Detailed Description

This is a simple class for holding 4 reals representing the colour any give object or lightsource can have.

Non-Alpha constructor.

This constructor assumes the alpha value to be 1.0 (completely opaque).
